multiplechoiceresponse.label: Why have there been a lot of attention in how we can move beyond the notion of step-by-step recurrent processing?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: To build more powerful architectures for processing sequential data
To eliminate the need for recurrence entirely
To establish long memory that can build nuanced understanding of sequential data
To parallelize computations to speed up processing
